name: Auto Drift
description:
A racing speed run game that is guaranteed to give you road rage. Fly around the track, use fuel cans to power you, and get to the end! Full release coming soon! 

Controls:

Left and right arrow key to turn. Space to go at the start of the level. Press enter to restart the level.

Ranking:

Under a minute - You are a god

Under a minute and a half - Impressive stuff

Under 2 minutes - Your alright

Under 3 minutes - Its okay, you'll get there

3 minutes and above - I'm sorry, but your garbage.
